fields.description: Current phase of development of the version.
URL for the resource representing the version creator
The username who last updated the version
The date after which the project version is scheduled to be deleted automatically
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The source type of the version
The name of the version
The distribution of the version.
Time/Date the version was released
Pertinent comments or notes associated with the version
The combination of licenses to assign to the component version
The relation of contained licenses.
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
URL to the representation of the license to assign
The name of the license
The ownership of the license
The codesharing of the license
Related licenses which follow the same structure as the license field
The display status of the license
The display status of the collection of licenses
The date/time when the version was created
The username who created the version
An alternative commonly used name or alias for the project version
Time/Date the version was last updated
Whether or not this project version is protected from automatic deletion
URL for the resource representing the user who last updated the version
